sn55.32:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.32:1.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.32:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato.
sn55.32:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro punnabhisanda kusalabhisanda sukhassahara”ti.
